#summary Not all files are created equally. These are some of the more important ones.
#labels Phase-Design,Phase-Implementation

= Application.cs =

An Application object is a single running instance of our executable. The *{{{Main}}}* method will be here to parse the command line. In the normal flow, we'll create a *{{{Game}}}* and make a call to *{{{Run()}}}* on it.

= Game.cs =

This is the *{{{Game}}}* object. The "main loop" is here under *{{{Run()}}}*.
